questions.Question: ATM means
questions.solution: Solution:		ATM means Automated Teller Machine.

questions.Question: CTBT stands for
questions.solution: Solution:		Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty is the full form of CTBT.

questions.Question: EVM stands for :
questions.solution: Solution:		EVM stands for Electronic Voting Machine.

questions.Question: Expand NABARD.
questions.optionA: National Bank for Agriculture and Resource Development
questions.optionB: National Bank for Agricultural and Rural Development
questions.optionC: National Bank for Asian Research Development
questions.optionD: National Bank for Agri Related Development
questions.solution: Solution:		NABARD stands for National Bank for Agricultural and Rural Development.

questions.Question: Expand the term IPCC :
questions.solution: Solution:		IPCC stands for Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change.

questions.Question: Which of the following is the right expansion of TRIMs?
questions.solution: Solution:		Trade Related Investment Measures is the right expansion of TRIMs.

questions.Question: Expand the term SWIFT.
questions.optionA: Society for Worldwide International Financial Telecommunications
questions.optionB: Society for the Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications
questions.optionC: Society for Worldwide International Financial Transfers
questions.optionD: Society for Worldwide Interbrain Fiscal Transactions
questions.solution: Solution:		Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications is the full form of SWIFT.

questions.Question: FIMMDA stands for . . . . . . . . .
questions.optionA: Foreign Investment Market & Derivatives Market Association
questions.optionB: Fixed Income Money Markets & Derivatives Association
questions.optionC: Fixed Income & Money Market Development Association
questions.optionD: Floating Income & Money Markets Derivative Assets
questions.solution: Solution:		FIMMDA stands for Fixed Income Money Markets & Derivatives Association.

questions.Question: Find the odd one out :
questions.optionA: IDBI - Financial assistance to large industries
questions.optionB: SIDBI - Financial assistance to small industries
questions.optionC: FCI - Financial assistance to food-grains merchants
questions.optionD: EXIM Bank - Financial assistance to exporters and importers
questions.solution: Solution:		FCI, the nodal central agency of Government of India, along with other State Agencies undertakes procurement of wheat and paddy under price support scheme.

questions.Question: Full form of BCG is :
questions.solution: Solution:		BCG, or Bacillus Calmette-Guerin, is a vaccine for tuberculosis (TB) disease.

questions.Question: GIS stands for :
questions.solution: Solution:		GIS stands for Geographical Information Systems.

questions.Question: The term PC means?
questions.solution: Solution:		The term PC means Personal Computer.

questions.Question: TRIMs stands for
questions.solution: Solution:		TRIMS stands for Trade-Related Investment Measures.

questions.Question: What is the expansion of the Indian political coalition, NDA?
questions.solution: Solution:		National Democratic Alliance is the full form of NDA.

questions.Question: What is the full form of ASSOCHAM?
questions.optionA: Associated Chambers of Commerce and Industry
questions.solution: Solution:		Associated Chambers of Commerce and Industry is the full form of ASSOCHAM.

questions.Question: Which of the following is not correct?
questions.solution: Solution:		The full form of BSF is Border Security Force.

questions.Question: RMSA means
questions.solution: Solution:		RMSA means Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Abhiyan.

questions.Question: SAGAR stands for
questions.optionA: South Asian Growth for all in the Region
questions.optionB: Security and Growth for all in the Region
questions.optionD: Strategic Agreement for Growth for all in the Region
questions.solution: Solution:		SAGAR stands for Security And Growth for All in the Region.

questions.Question: SIDBI stands for -
questions.optionC: Small Industries Development Bank of India
questions.optionD: Small Industrial Design Bank of India
questions.solution: Solution:		SIDBI stands for Small Industries Development Bank of India.

questions.Question: The abbreviation LHC stands for which machine?
questions.solution: Solution:		The abbreviation LHC stands for Large Hadron Collider.

questions.Question: The term GIGO is related to
questions.solution: Solution:		The term GIGO is related to accuracy.

questions.Question: MODVAT is related to -
questions.solution: Solution:		MODVAT is related to Excise Tax.

questions.Question: MRTS stands for :
questions.solution: Solution:		MRTS stands for Mass Rapid Transit System.

questions.Question: National Agricultural Cooperative Marketing Federation is known as -
questions.solution: Solution:		National Agricultural Cooperative Marketing Federation is known as NACMF.

questions.Question: OTEC stands for -
questions.solution: Solution:		OTEC stands for Ocean Thermal Energy Conversion.

questions.Question: RAF is the abbreviated form of which of the following?
questions.solution: Solution:		RAF is the abbreviated form of Rapid Action Force.

questions.Question: In India FERA has been replaced by?
questions.solution: Solution:		FERA was repealed in 1998 by the government of Atal Bihari Vajpayee and replaced by the Foreign Exchange Management Act (FEMA), which liberalised foreign exchange controls and restrictions on foreign investment.

questions.Question: ISRO is the abbreviation for -
questions.solution: Solution:		ISRO is the abbreviation for Indian Space Research Organisation.

questions.Question: JDBC stands for :
questions.solution: Solution:		JDBC stands for Java Database Connectivity.

questions.Question: JIMEX 2018 related to
questions.solution: Solution:		JIMEX 2018 relates to Japan-India Maritime Exercise.

questions.Question: LAN stands for
questions.solution: Solution:		LAN stands for Local Area Network.
